attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ensure that terminal cancer victim and charity cyclist Jane Tomlinson becomes a Dame in the New Year's Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jane is an inspiration to all, refusing to be beaten by her diagnosis and prognosis and going on to raise a tremendous amount of money for charity. A more worthy recipient of an honour could not be found and we urge you to act before it's too late for her to be so honoured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
